response: Captain Henry Newton KnightsThe Times, 16 October 1918, p. 6.

The Camberwell North by-election of 1922 was held on 20 February 1922.  The by-election was held due to the resignation of the incumbent Coalition Conservative MP, Henry Newton Knights.  It was won by the Labour candidate Charles Ammon.
*Captain Henry Newton Knights  Chairman of a Local Advisory Committee
